            <div class="banner-message"><div class="message-wrapper" id="banner_general_message_1">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12">
            <h2 class="message-header A-TYP22L-RW-ALL">慎防钓鱼短信</h2>
            <button class="close-message-button" data-message-id="5b0c8d0f8d">
                <span class="icon icon-delete" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="visuallyhidden"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
        <div class="sm-12 lg-8">
            <div class="message-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"><p>汇丰绝不会要求客户通过短信连结或电话联系第三方保险公司。所有由汇丰发出之单向短信的发送人名称皆以“#“号为首。请保持警惕！<a href="/zh-cn/help/cybersecurity-and-fraud/phishing/">了解更多</a>。</p>
</div>

    </div>
